forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with thunderstorms, especially during the morning hours. High 11C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with thunderstorms, especially during the morning hours. High 51F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 49F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 6C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 8C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 46F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 4C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 39F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 46F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 40F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 45F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
